tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PDT Such) (DT a) (NN blessing)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB see) (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS brothers)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (NNP Christ)) (VP (VBG working) (ADVP (RB tirelessly)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNP Kingdom)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP God)))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [see/VB nsubj>[blessing/NN det:predet>Such/PDT det>a/DT] mark>to/TO dobj>[brothers/NNS nmod:poss>your/PRP$] nmod:in>[Christ/NNP case>in/IN acl>[working/VBG advmod>tirelessly/RB nmod:for>[Kingdom/NNP case>for/IN det>the/DT nmod:of>[God/NNP case>of/IN]]]] punct>./.]
